abstract:
A theory in which 16-dimensional curved Clifford space (C-space)
provides a realization of Kaluza Klein theory is investigated. No extra
dimensions of spacetime are needed: “extra dimensions” are
in C-space. It is shown that the covariant Dirac equation in C-space
contains Yang Mills fields of the U(1)×SU(2)×SU(3) group as
parts of the generalized spin connection of the C-space.
